body_html: @theflofly some kind of variable initializer would be a useful addition. In addition it would be useful as well to add some kind of function to get the set of trainable variable in the graph. Such as trainable_variable() or get_collection() in Python. What do you think?

body: @theflofly some kind of variable initializer would be a useful addition. In addition it would be useful as well to add some kind of function to get the set of trainable variable in the graph. Such as trainable_variable() or get_collection() in Python. What do you think?
